scripts.build: ./node_modules/.bin/babel src/client --out-dir client/build ; browserify client/build/board.js --outfile client/dist/board.js ; browserify client/build/index.js --outfile client/dist/index.js ; browserify client/build/initialization.js --outfile client/dist/initialization.js ; ./node_modules/.bin/babel src/server --out-dir server ;chmod u+x ./server/main.js;
scripts.start: ./node_modules/.bin/babel src/client --out-dir client/build ; browserify client/build/board.js --outfile client/dist/board.js ; browserify client/build/index.js --outfile client/dist/index.js ; browserify client/build/initialization.js --outfile client/dist/initialization.js ; ./node_modules/.bin/babel src/server --out-dir server ;chmod u+x ./server/main.js; ./server/main.js
